channel.title: How to Change IP (Hamachi & Rune-Evo v3/Foxtrot 718)
channel.description: Hello, I am using Hamachi and Rune-Evo v3, every time I login to my server it says blahblahblah logged in (127.0.0.1) < thats the problem, I don't want localhost, I want to put my Hamachi IP, I have put it in: Configuration.java, Class26.java, and Loader.java in the appropriate field. I have compiled both server AND client and I still am logged into localhost (127.0.0.1 on my server cmd), so do I need to revert any files back to localhost (that I shouldn't of changed) and/or WHAT file do I need to change. Thanks!

item.title: How to Change IP (Hamachi & Rune-Evo v3/Foxtrot 718)
item.dc:creator: @weed_plant1 weed_plant
item.description:
@weed_plant1 wrote:

There’s nothing wrong with that, it’s Hamachi.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Change IP (Hamachi & Rune-Evo v3/Foxtrot 718)

item.title: How to Change IP (Hamachi & Rune-Evo v3/Foxtrot 718)
item.dc:creator: @jacob42 jacob42
item.description:
@jacob42 wrote:

Can some PLEASE just tell me EXACTLY what to edit for Rune-Evo v3 (Foxtrot 718). All my friends changed all their files with 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 to my Hamachi IP, but they still login as localhost (127.0.0.1). Someone tell me what files EXACTLY to edit and EXACTLY where so I know I am doing this right, anyone, please! (Remember this is for Rune-Evo v3/Foxtrot 718.)

EDIT: bump

Read full topic
item.source: How to Change IP (Hamachi & Rune-Evo v3/Foxtrot 718)

item.title: How to Change IP (Hamachi & Rune-Evo v3/Foxtrot 718)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“jacob42, post:3, topic:539947”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=658798.msg4406280#msg4406280 date=1392075984]
It will say you logged in from 127.0.0.1 because you logged in from the host machine. Try letting your friends log in and it should display their IP.

tl;dr I see no issue.
[/quote]

What files do they need to change if any? (Change to my Hamachi IP)

And what exact files does the IP need.[/quote]I don’t know how hamachi exactly works but I think you will need to modify the client ip to match your hamachi one? Then compile it and distribute it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Change IP (Hamachi & Rune-Evo v3/Foxtrot 718)
